about_the_game:
Highway Driving is 3D racing game for everyone. Players will be amazed with the overall gaming experience in this game. There are various different tracks and game modes in the game. Players can select many different types of vehicles.

Features
1. 3D Racing game for everyone.
2. Infinite racing tracks with different modes. (1 Race track is available in free Version. Buy Full Version to unlock all tracks.
3. Various different vehicles are available for the player to choose from. (2 Vehicles are available as free in Demo version)
4. Proper score system and some features can be unlocked with money earned in game.
5. Suitable for all age group.

Get ready to experience ultimate driving on highway.

Note : Support for Steering wheels and Pedals added in the updated build.

developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Highway Driving Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support for Steering wheels and Pedals added.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia GTX 970 Graphic Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support for Steering wheels and Pedals added.

publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
short_description: Highway Driving is 3D racing game for everyone. Players will be amazed with the overall gaming experience in this game. There are various different tracks and game modes in the game. Players can select many different types of vehicles.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
